name: Insufficient Adherence to Expected Conventions
description:
The product's architecture, source code, design, documentation,
					or other artifact does not follow required conventions.
extended_description: <xhtml:p>This issue makes it more difficult to maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.</xhtml:p>

submission.submission_comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
